Excel.name: This test allows you to test your Excel skills and understanding
Excel.caption: What are the main applications of Excel?
Excel.Explanation: What specific problems is Excel designed for?

answers.name: Making plans for the time period

Excel.caption: Formulas in Excel are?
Excel.Explanation: What are Excel formulas and what should they contain?

answers.name: Functions in which you need to enter parameters in a certain order
Code in the VBA programming language
The user's unique language, which he himself can change and customize to achieve his goals

Excel.caption: Why do I need pivot tables?
Excel.Explanation: What practical problems do pivot tables solve?

answers.name: I view and group information in the context of certain parameters
To create better reports than in Word
To group data instead of formulas

Excel.caption: What will be the result?
Excel.Explanation: There is data ('A1':100,'A2':200), if user writes formula (=SUMIF(A1:A2;'>150'), what will be the result?

Excel.caption: Need to mark values that meet a certain condition
How do I automatically update data to a pivot table?

answers.name: Before creating a pivot table, select a range and select smart tables
Select the mode in Excel smart table
Select in the pivot table to automatically expand the range
